snippet.title: GAMBONANZA - Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist GAMBONANZA now! https://store.steampowered.com/app/3509230/Gambonanza/

GAMBONANZA is a mind-twisting roguelike where every move unleashes crazy combos! Build powerful synergies between your chess pieces and 100+ Gambits to turn the board into a tactical playground of pure chaos. With board upgrades, unique mechanics, and wild mini-games, no two runs are ever the same!

💡 100+ Gambits to create game-breaking strategies
♟️ Reserve System: store extra pieces and deploy them at the perfect moment
🛡️ Board Upgrades: golden tiles, blessings, protective squares, and more
🎰 Mini-games inspired by pachinko & Gachapon for insane power-ups
👑 5 challenging bosses to defeat in the ultimate strategic showdown

🔔 Wishlist now and break the rules ♟️💥

A game made by Blukulélé
🐦 https://x.com/Blukulele
🦋 https://bsky.app/profile/blukulelestudio.bsky.social
